sn9.4:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ sambahulā bhikkhū kosalesu viharanti aññatarasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe.
sn9.4:1.2: Atha kho te bhikkhū vassaṁvuṭṭhā temāsaccayena cārikaṁ pakkamiṁsu.
sn9.4:1.3: Atha kho yā tasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā te bhikkhū apassantī paridevamānā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
sn9.4:3.1: Evaṁ vutte, aññatarā devatā taṁ devataṁ gāthāya paccabhāsi:
